raw_comment:
Where in the graph does the evidence reside to substantiate your claim?
What factors contribute to the lower frequency of in-person visits, and what explains the trend of increased outreach by young women?
The consequences extend to all students at my high school, and when I communicate with my parents...
To what extent do teenagers seek assistance from their parents?
ace_sentences: You need evidence to substantiate the claim.
The evidence must reside in the graph.
I ask where the evidence resides in the graph.
In-person visits have a lower frequency.
Some factors contribute to the lower frequency of in-person visits.
I ask what factors contribute to the lower frequency of in-person visits.
There is a trend of increased outreach by young women.
Some factors explain the trend of increased outreach by young women.
I ask what explains the trend of increased outreach by young women.
The consequences extend to all students at my high school.
I am a student at my high school.
Teenagers seek assistance from their parents.
I ask to what extent teenagers seek assistance from their parents.
